mapper.insert: Insert into users (user_id, employee_id, user_position, password, user_name, user_email, user_access_level,profile_img,user_created_at,department_id) Values (#{userId},#{employeeId},#{userPosition},#{password},#{userName}, #{userEmail},"USER",#{profileImg},#{userCreatedAt},#{departmentId})
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id ,u.employee_id , u.password , u.user_name ,u.user_position ,u.user_email ,u.user_created_at , u.user_access_level , u.department_id , u.profile_img, u.session_id, u.limit_time, d.department_name FROM Users u inner join Department d on u.department_id=d.department_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT user_id, user_NAME, user_EMAIL, User_Access_level, LIMIT_TIME, profile_img, department_id FROM Users WHERE SESSION_ID = #{sessionId}
